component.name: anotherImage
component.script:
sub init() m.lastFocused = m.top.getScene().focusedChild m.top.uri = "pkg:/images/logo.png" end sub function onKeyEvent(key as String, press as Boolean) as Boolean print "key at another Image : " key press if press if key = "right" m.top.uri = "http://portal.g-mana.live/app/fav.png" print m.top.uri return true
else if key = "left" m.top.visible = false m.lastFocused.setFocus(true) return true end if end if return false end function
